<script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/PapaParse/5.4.1/papaparse.min.js"></script>
<style>
    .button {
        font-family: Euclid Circular A,sans-serif;
        background-color: #184afb;
        border: none;
        color: white;
        padding-left: 32px;
        padding-right: 32px;
        text-align: center;
        text-decoration: none;
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: 16px;
        cursor: pointer;
        border-radius: 6px;
        height: 40px;
    }
    .button:hover {
        background-color: #0b2fd4;
    }

    .button:active {
        background-color: #001aad;
    }

    #my_file {
        display: none;
    }
</style>
<button id="sa-import-collection" class="button" onclick="importCollection()">Import collection</button>
<input type="file" id="my_file" accept=".csv">
<script>
    const fileEl = document.getElementById("my_file");
    fileEl.addEventListener('change', function(e) {
        if (e.target.files[0]) {
            const file = e.target.files[0];
            if (file) {
                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.readAsText(file, "UTF-8");
                reader.onload = function (evt) {
                    var data = Papa.parse(evt.target.result);
                    window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(data.data) });
                }
                reader.onerror = function (evt) {
                    document.getElementById("fileContents").innerHTML = "error reading file";
                }
            }
        }
    });
    
    function importCollection() {
        fileEl.click();
    }

</script>

<script>
    let openAI;

    // Listen for messages from the main form
    window.addEventListener('message', async e => {
        try {
            await commandHandler(e.data.data);
        } catch (error) {
            console.log(">>> >>> >>> SuperAnnotate Error! >>> >>> >>>", error.message);
            window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify({ error: error.message }) });
        }
    });

    /// Command handler
    async function commandHandler(data) {
        const parsedData = JSON.parse(data);
        const { command } = parsedData;
        const response = { command };

        switch (command) {
            case "init":
                const { api_key, system_description } = parsedData;
                openAI = new OpenAI(api_key, system_description);
                break;
            case "list_models":
                console.log(">>> >>> >>> list_models");
                const models = await openAI.listModels();
                response.data = models;
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
            case "list_fine_tuning_jobs":
                console.log(">>> >>> >>> list_fine_tuning_jobs");
                const jobs = await openAI.listFineTuningJobs()
                response.data = jobs;
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
            case "list_files":
                console.log(">>> >>> >>> list_files", openAI.apiKey);
                const files = await openAI.listFiles()
                response.data = files;
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
            case "delete_file":
                console.log(">>> >>> >>> delete_file");
                const { file_id } = parsedData;
                const del = await openAI.deleteFile(file_id)
                response.data = del;
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
            case "upload_file":
                console.log(">>> >>> >>> upload_file");
                const { file_name, dataset } = parsedData;
                const uploadFile = await openAI.uploadFile(file_name, dataset)
                response.data = uploadFile;
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
            case "create_fine_tuning_job":
                console.log(">>> >>> >>> create_fine_tuning_job");
                const { base_model, suffix } = parsedData;
                const fileId = parsedData.file_id;
                const createJob = await openAI.createFineTuningJob(base_model, fileId, suffix)
                response.data = createJob;
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
            default:
                response.error = "Error: no command specified!";
                window.parent.postMessage({ action: 'topy', data: JSON.stringify(response) });
                break;
        }
    }

    class OpenAI {
        constructor(apiKey, systemDescription) {
            if (apiKey) {
                this.apiKey = apiKey;
            }

            this.systemDescription = (systemDescription) ? systemDescription : "Super is a factual chatbot";
        }


        /// File related functions
        listFiles = async () => {
            const headers = [{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }];
            return this.request("GET", "/files", headers);
        }
        uploadFile = (fileName, dataset) => {
            const formdata = new FormData();
            formdata.append("purpose", "fine-tune");

            const file = new File([this.toJsonlStr(dataset)], fileName, {
                type: "text/json",
            });

            formdata.append("file", file);
            return this.request("POST", "/files", null, null, formdata);
        }
        deleteFile = async (fileId) => {
            const headers = [{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }];
            return this.request("DELETE", `/files/${fileId}`, headers);
        }


        /// Fune-tuning related functions
        createFineTuningJob = (baseModel, fileId, suffix) => {
            const body = {
                model: baseModel,
                training_file: fileId,
                suffix
            };

            const headers = [{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }];
            return this.request("POST", "/fine_tuning/jobs", headers, null, JSON.stringify(body));
        }
        listFineTuningJobs = async (after, limit) => {
            let query = null;
            if (after) {
                query = { after };
            }
            if (limit) {
                if (!query) {
                    query = {};
                }
                query.limit = limit;
            }

            const headers = [{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }];
            return this.request("GET", "/fine_tuning/jobs", headers, query);
        }
        getFineTuningEvents = async (jobId) => {
            const headers = [{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }];
            return this.request("GET", `/jobs/${jobId}/events`, headers);
        }


        /// Model related functions
        listModels = async () => {
            const headers = [{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }];
            return this.request("GET", "/models", headers);
        }


        /// Helper functions
        request = (method, path, headers, params, body) => {
            let url = "https://api.openai.com/v1" + path
            const myHeaders = new Headers();
            if(this.apiKey) {
                myHeaders.append("Authorization", `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`);
            }
            if (headers && headers.length) {
                headers.forEach(header => {
                    const key = Object.keys(header)[0]
                    myHeaders.append(Object.keys(header)[0], header[key]);
                });
            }
            let requestOptions;

            switch (method.toLowerCase()) {
                case "get":
                case "delete":
                    requestOptions = {
                        method,
                        headers: myHeaders,
                    }
                    if (params) {
                        url = url + jsonToQueryString(params);
                    }
                    break;
                case "post":
                    requestOptions = {
                        method,
                        headers: myHeaders,
                    };
                    if (body) {
                        requestOptions.body = body;
                    }
                    break;
                default:
                    break;
            }
            return fetch(url, requestOptions)
                .then(response => {
                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error(`POST ${url} responded with ${response.status} status code.`);
                    } else {
                        return response.json();
                    }
                })
                .then(result => result)
                .catch(error => {
                    throw error
                });
        }
        jsonToQueryString = (json) => {
            return '?' +
                Object.keys(json).map(function (key) {
                    return encodeURIComponent(key) + '=' +
                        encodeURIComponent(json[key]);
                }).join('&');
        }
        toJsonlStr = (data) => {
            let dataStr = "";
            data.forEach(row => {
                const newRow = {
                    messages: [
                        { role: "system", content: this.systemDescription },
                        { role: "user", content: row.prompt },
                        { role: "assistant", content: row.completion },
                    ]
                }
                dataStr += (JSON.stringify(newRow) + "\n");
            });
            return dataStr;
        }
    }
</script>

code:
from typing import List, Union

from accessor import (
    getValue,
    repeatRow,
    deleteRow,
    setValue,
    setLoading,
    getGroupLength,
    postMessageToWebComponent
)
from environments import (
    url,
    open_ai_api_key
)
import json
from js import (localStorage, window)

textarea_prompt = ['prompt']
rating_rating = ['rating']
textarea_comment = ['comment']
webComponent_comp_preview = ['comp_preview']
code_comp_code = ['comp_code']
webComponent_fine_tuning_web = ['fine_tuning_web']
paragraph_collection_length = ['collection_length']
webComponent_model_select_custom = ['model_select_custom']
webComponent_comp_model_1_select = ['comp_model_1_select']
webComponent_comp_model_2_select = ['comp_model_2_select']
webComponent_comp_model_1_preview = ['comp_model_1_preview']
webComponent_comp_model_2_preview = ['comp_model_2_preview']
textarea_comp_prompt = ['comp_prompt']
input_model_suffix = ['model_suffix']
input_file_name = ['file_name']
paragraph_training_file_name = ['training_file_name']
paragraph_training_file_id = ['training_file_id']
select_base_model = ['base_model']

collection = []
fine_tuning_jobs = []
selected_model = 'gpt-3.5-turbo'
selected_comp_model_1 = selected_model
selected_comp_model_2 = selected_model

### Helper functions
def init():
    global collection
    collection = get_data()
    reset_item_form()
    update_collection_table()
    if (open_ai_api_key == '' or open_ai_api_key == None):
        window.alert('Please add "open_ai_api_key" in variables tab.')

    to_open_ai_api('init', api_key=open_ai_api_key)
    to_open_ai_api('list_models')
    to_open_ai_api('list_fine_tuning_jobs')
    to_open_ai_api('list_files')

def get_data():
    data_str = localStorage.getItem("SA_data")
    try:
        data_json = json.loads(data_str)
        return data_json
    except:
        return []

def set_data():
    localStorage.setItem("SA_data", json.dumps(collection))

def add_data_row(prompt: str, completion: str, rating: int, comment: str):
    data_row = {
        'prompt': prompt,
        'completion': completion,
        'rating': rating,
        'comment': comment
    }
    collection.insert(0, data_row)
    set_data()
    update_collection_table()

def delete_data_row(index):
    collection.pop(index)
    set_data()
    setValue(paragraph_collection_length, len(collection))

def update_collection_table():
    table_length = getGroupLength(['table_collection'])
    for x in range(table_length):
        deleteRow(['table_collection', -1])
    row_index = 1
    for data_row in collection:
        repeatRow(['table_collection'])
        setValue(['table_collection', -1, 'row_index'], row_index)
        setValue(['table_collection', -1, 'row_prompt'], data_row['prompt'])
        setValue(['table_collection', -1, 'row_comp'], data_row['completion'])
        setValue(['table_collection', -1, 'row_rating'], data_row['rating'])
        setValue(['table_collection', -1, 'row_comment'], data_row['comment'])
        row_index += 1
    setValue(paragraph_collection_length, len(collection))

def reset_item_form():
    setValue(textarea_prompt, "")
    to_chat_gpt_generator('clear')
    setValue(rating_rating, 0)
    setValue(textarea_comment, "")
    setValue(code_comp_code, "")

def to_open_ai_api(command, api_key='', file_id='', file_name='', dataset='', base_model='', suffix=''):
    request_data = {
        'command': command,
        'api_key': api_key,
        'file_id': file_id,
        'file_name': file_name,
        'dataset': dataset,
        'base_model': base_model,
        'suffix': suffix
    }
    postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_fine_tuning_web, json.dumps(request_data));
    return

def from_open_ai_api(response):
    error = ''
    if 'error' in response:
        error = response['error']
        window.alert(error)
        return
    
    command = ''
    if 'command' in response:
        command = response['command']

    print(error)
    match command:
        case 'list_models':
            model_options = []
            for model in response['data']['data']:
                if model['owned_by'] != 'openai-internal' and model['owned_by'] != 'openai-dev':
                    model_option = {
                        'label': model['id'],
                        'value': model['id']
                    }
                    model_options.insert(0, model_option)
            global selected_model
            selected_model = model_options[0]['value']
            global selected_comp_model_1
            selected_comp_model_1 = model_options[0]['value']
            global selected_comp_model_2
            selected_comp_model_2 = model_options[0]['value']
            postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_model_select_custom, json.dumps(model_options))
            postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_model_1_select, json.dumps(model_options))
            postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_model_2_select, json.dumps(model_options))
        case 'list_fine_tuning_jobs':
            global fine_tuning_jobs
            fine_tuning_jobs = response['data']['data']
            update_job_events_table()
            pass
        case 'list_files':
            index = 1
            for file in response['data']['data']:
                repeatRow(['files_row'])
                setValue(['files_row', -1, 'file_index_row'], index)
                setValue(['files_row', -1, 'file_name_row'], file['filename'])
                setValue(['files_row', -1, 'file_id_row'], file['id'])
                index += 1
        case 'delete_file':
            pass
        case 'upload_file':
            file = response['data']
            repeatRow(['files_row'])
            setValue(['files_row', -1, 'file_index_row'], getGroupLength(['files_row']))
            setValue(['files_row', -1, 'file_name_row'], file['filename'])
            setValue(['files_row', -1, 'file_id_row'], file['id'])
            setValue(input_file_name, '')
            setLoading(False)
        case 'create_fine_tuning_job':
            to_open_ai_api('list_fine_tuning_jobs')
            setLoading(False)
        case _: print('Wrong response!')
    return

def update_job_events_table():
    is_running = False
    table_length = getGroupLength(['job_events'])
    for x in range(table_length):
        deleteRow(['job_events', -1])
    for job in fine_tuning_jobs:
        if(job['status'] == 'validating_files' or job['status'] == 'queued' or job['status'] == 'running'):
            repeatRow(['job_events'])
            setValue(['job_events', -1, 'running_job_id'], job['id'])
            setValue(['job_events', -1, 'running_job_model'], job['fine_tuned_model'])
            setValue(['job_events', -1, 'running_job_status'], job['status'])
            is_running = True
    if (is_running == False):
        to_open_ai_api('list_models')
    return is_running

def to_chat_gpt_generator(command, url="", model="", prompt="", completion=""):
    request_data = {
        'command': command,
        'url': url,
        'model': model,
        'prompt': prompt,
        'completion': completion
    }
    postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_preview, json.dumps(request_data));

def from_chat_gpt_generator(data):
    if 'error' in data:
        window.alert(data['error'])
        return ''
    elif 'data' in data:
        return data['data']
    else:
        return ''

### Event handlers
def on_generate_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    promt_text = getValue(textarea_prompt)
    if(promt_text == '' or promt_text == None):
        window.alert("Please enter a prompt.")
    else:
        setLoading(True)
        to_chat_gpt_generator(command='generate', url=url, prompt=promt_text, model=selected_model)
    return

def on_add_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    new_prmt = getValue(textarea_prompt)
    new_comp = getValue(code_comp_code)
    new_rate = getValue(rating_rating)
    new_comm = getValue(textarea_comment)

    add_data_row(new_prmt, new_comp, new_rate, new_comm)
    reset_item_form()
    return

def on_comp_preview_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    setLoading(False)
    text = from_chat_gpt_generator(value)
    setValue(code_comp_code, text)
    return

def on_comp_code_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    to_chat_gpt_generator(command='input', completion=value)
    return

def on_table_collection_deleted(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    print(path)
    delete_data_row(path[1])
    return

def on_row_prompt_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global collection
    collection[path[1]]['prompt'] = value
    set_data()
    return

def on_row_comp_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global collection
    collection[path[1]]['completion'] = value
    set_data()
    return

def on_row_rating_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global collection
    collection[path[1]]['rating'] = value
    set_data()
    return

def on_row_comment_change(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global collection
    collection[path[1]]['comment'] = value
    set_data()
    return

def on_fine_tuning_web_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    response = json.loads(value)
    from_open_ai_api(response)
    return

def on_model_select_custom_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global selected_model
    selected_model = value
    return

def on_comp_model_1_select_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global selected_comp_model_1
    selected_comp_model_1 = value
    return

def on_comp_model_2_select_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    global selected_comp_model_2
    selected_comp_model_2 = value
    return

def on_comp_model_1_preview_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    setValue(code_comp_code, value)
    to_chat_gpt_generator(command='input', completion=value)
    return

def on_comp_model_2_preview_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    setValue(code_comp_code, value)
    to_chat_gpt_generator(command='input', completion=value)
    return

def on_comp_generate_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    promt_text = getValue(textarea_comp_prompt)
    if(promt_text == '' or promt_text == None):
        window.alert("Please enter a prompt.")
        return
    request_data_1 = {
        'command': 'generate',
        'url': url,
        'prompt': promt_text,
        'model': selected_comp_model_1
    }
    postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_model_1_preview, json.dumps(request_data_1))
    request_data_2 = {
        'command': 'generate',
        'url': url,
        'prompt': promt_text,
        'model': selected_comp_model_2
    }
    postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_model_2_preview, json.dumps(request_data_2))
    return

def on_add_as_item_1_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    prompt = getValue(textarea_comp_prompt)
    setValue(textarea_prompt, prompt)
    request_data = {
        'command': 'get_completion'
    }
    postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_model_1_preview, json.dumps(request_data))
    return

def on_add_as_item_2_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    prompt = getValue(textarea_comp_prompt)
    setValue(textarea_prompt, prompt)
    request_data = {
        'command': 'get_completion'
    }
    postMessageToWebComponent(webComponent_comp_model_2_preview, json.dumps(request_data))
    return

def on_clear_collection_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    if (window.confirm("Are you sure, you want to clear the collection?")):
        global collection
        collection = []
        set_data()
        update_collection_table()
    return

def on_import_collection_message(path: List[Union[str, int]], value):
    data_json = json.loads(value)
    index = 0
    for data_row in data_json:
        if(index > 0):
            if (len(data_row) > 8 ):
                data_row = {
                    'prompt': data_row[5],
                    'completion': data_row[6],
                    'rating': data_row[9],
                    'comment': data_row[8]
                }
                collection.insert(0, data_row)
        index += 1
    set_data()
    update_collection_table()

    return

def on_use_file_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    file_name = getValue(['files_row', path[1], 'file_name_row'])
    file_id = getValue(['files_row', path[1], 'file_id_row'])
    setValue(paragraph_training_file_name, file_name)
    setValue(paragraph_training_file_id, file_id)
    return

def on_files_row_deleted(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    file_id = getValue(['files_row', path[1], 'file_id_row'])
    to_open_ai_api('delete_file', file_id=file_id)
    return

def on_upload_button_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    setLoading(True)
    file_name = getValue(input_file_name)
    if (file_name == '' or file_name == None):
        file_name = "new_collection"
        setValue(input_file_name, file_name)

    to_open_ai_api('upload_file', file_name=file_name, dataset=collection)
    return

def on_start_training_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    suffix = getValue(input_model_suffix)
    file_id = getValue(paragraph_training_file_id)
    base_model = getValue(select_base_model)

    if (base_model == '' or base_model == None):
        window.alert("Please chose a base model!")
        return
    if (suffix == '' or suffix == None):
        suffix = "new_model"
        setValue(input_model_suffix, suffix)
    if (file_id == '' or file_id == None):
        window.alert("No file is chosen!")
        return

    is_running = update_job_events_table()
    if (is_running):
        window.alert("You already have a running job!")
        return

    setLoading(True)
    to_open_ai_api('create_fine_tuning_job', base_model=base_model, file_id=file_id, suffix=suffix)
    return

init()
